title: Starship Troopers
author: Bgame Productions
description: Starship Troopers TC is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D . It was created by Bgame Productions. It features new levels, new weapons, new sprites for the player (MI trooper) and enemies, new graphics, new items, and new music. The mod was well-known for the high level of quality on Dukeworld.
